DOC.brief_title: Sickle Cell Disease : A Retrospective Chart Review
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients diagnosis Sickle Cell Disease ( SCD ) confirm genotype 2 . Patients ≥ 16 year age 3 . Patients ≥ 6 month followup data available first SCD treatment center reach 16 year old 4 . At least one SF read nonacute phase first SCD treatment center reach 16 year old 1 . Patients participate clinical trial iron chelate medication clinical trial transfusion SCD ( 1 ) within six month index date ( 2 ) patient observation period 2 . Patients sickle cell trait Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
